appearances.title: U.S. Senate Sen. Barrasso R-WY on Iran Protests : CSPAN2 : January 16, 2026 1:13am-1:19am EST
appearances.snippet: . >> senate majority whip john barrasso spoke in support of iranian protestors who condemn country's leaders and criticize ayatollah and crack-down on protestors and commented on the situation in venezuela. >> mr. president, i rise today to stand with the brave people of iran. thesetc are people who have been in a fight for their freedom st5 different cities in all 31 different provinces in iran. it's not like anything the country has seen in a generation. iranis are rejecting the oppression and the ruin that has been brought forth by four decades of tyranny. americans stand with them. i think free people everywhere are watching. from europe and south america to right here in the united states, we bear witness to the contrast -- and it's a dramatic contrast -- between the iranian people's bravery and the iranian regime brutality. the protests, the results are mass murder. there's been islamic revolutionary guard corp that's done tremendous damage. they've been released to mas car the citizens. thousands, perhaps tens of thousands are reported dead in iran. this surpasses the death to
